name: Toyota Land Cruiser
description: The Toyota Land Cruiser 250 VX-L combines rugged off-road capability with luxurious comfort, making it perfect for both city driving and adventurous journeys.

name: Range Rover Sport
description: The Range Rover Sport combines luxury and performance, offering a smooth ride, advanced technology, and a sleek design. Perfect for both city driving and off-road adventures.

name: Rolls Royce Ghost
description: The Rolls Royce Ghost is the epitome of luxury, offering unparalleled comfort, cutting-edge technology, and a whisper-quiet ride. A true statement of elegance and sophistication.

name: Porsche Taycan
description: The Porsche Taycan is a fully electric sports car that delivers thrilling performance, stunning design, and zero emissions. Experience the future of driving with this cutting-edge vehicle.
